name: Space Cadet
description:
Space Cadet is a game created by Dennis McGrogan for S.C. Woolridge's VTZ being shown at LA Zinefest on May 28th, 2017.

The theme of this issue of the VTZ is "Fuck you I'm an astronaut." Space Cadet embraces the theme by creating a world in which you play as a cadet "exploring" the destruction of the known universe.

Controls are:

W, A, S, D for movement

Spacebar for shooting
